title: [K-12] Language Education Innovation Through Collaborative VR Environment Design and Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic VR platforms, foundational language education theory, and proficiency in multimedia content creation tools
context.additional_context: Students collaborate on VR platforms like Spatial.io using personal devices (BYOD), developing and evaluating language education VR scenarios through peer assessment and iterative improvements.

learning_goals: Learners can execute a collaborative process for designing language education scenarios in VR environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can evaluate and improve the interactivity and educational effectiveness of VR educational content using a 4-level scale with peer assessment rubrics
Learners can finalize immersive VR scenarios tailored to language learning objectives through iterative design (3+ revisions)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
